sys_script.name: Start&End date corrector

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_54383ecd971e4110002ffef3a253afd9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_616811_coworking_csr_reservations</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Start&End date corrector</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var reservationUtil = new ReservationUtils();
	var didExcept = false;
	if(reservationUtil.dateIsPastCurrentTime( current.u_start_time, current.u_end_time)){
		gs.addErrorMessage("Start and End cannot be past current time");
		didExcept = true;
	}
	if(reservationUtil.endIsBeforeStart(current.u_start_time, current.u_end_time)){
		gs.addErrorMessage("End cannot be past Start");
		didExcept = true;
	
	}
	if(didExcept == true){
		var asd = new GlideRecord("x_616811_coworking_csr_reservations");
		asd.addQuery("u_start_time", "<", current.u_start_time);
		asd.addQuery("u_end_time", ">", current.u_start_time);
		asd.query();
	
	gs.addInfoMessage(asd.getRowCount());
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		
	}
	else{
		gs.addInfoMessage("Total rent amount: P123.12");
	}
	
	
	
// 	while(asd.next()){
// 	gs.info(asd.u_start_time); 
		
// 	}
// 	gs.info(asd.getRowCount()); 
// 	asd.addQuery("u_start_time" ,"STARTSWITH", current.u_start_time);
	
	
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-16 08:29:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>54383ecd971e4110002ffef3a253afd9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Start&End date corrector</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_54383ecd971e4110002ffef3a253afd9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-17 09:09:21</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=54383ecd971e4110002ffef3a253afd9"/></record_update>
